page.title: 09Large Caravan Site
page.content: One of the largest caravan sites is the Eastgate Holiday Centre.It is 2 minutes walk to the beach.There are nearly 400 vans on the site.For the visitors' needs there are a supermarket and an off licence.If they do not wish to prepare their own meals there are a self-service restaurant and a Golden Fry Chippie.There is also a launderette with automatic machines. A gift shop and outdoor market with up to 200 stalls are available for buying presents etc..For children there are pop groups and other entertainments in the evening.During the day a swimming pool,fun-fair and amusement arcade keep them happy.For the adults there are competitions,talent contests and disco dancing championships as well as dominoes,darts,pool and bingo.A night club,a disco and wine bars are available in the evenings.
